Reviews.Title: “Hotel Tivoli, great, as always!”
Reviews.Author: seeker141
Reviews.Content: returned tivoli past september located toma 3 minute walk vaporetto stop spot venture city recommend reserving upper facing courtyard stairs lends quieter nice morning view shuttered windows breakfast fine abundance fresh cold cuts cereals bread jam pretty decent cappuccino staff job support front desk service housekeeping main location accommodation greatjust minutes eg 10 minutes academia 10 minutes piazzo san giacomo 3 minutes campo toma minutes direction weather perfect time recommend lunch fondamenta nuove views etc situated water spectacular action water crowds ciao

Reviews.Title: “lovely hotel tivoli”
Reviews.Author: jmeyersforeman
Reviews.Content: budget hotel close train station walk hotel drag luggage couple bridges close main tourist attractions quiet authentic close piazzas feel real venice tourist venice clean bright third floor separate bathroom looked courtyard service excellent staff friendly family feeling breakfast continental style gone 6 am sunrise st marks square missed breakfast sunrise worth able store luggage hotel arrival late checkout happily stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JERVancouver_BC
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel fantastic easytofind location triple floor clean comfortable size stayed hot spell september air conditioning found longing trying crowds heat breakfast typical european continental breakfast enjoyed taking meal charming courtyard staff friendly helpful happy drop bags morning arriving overnight train washrooms freshen able leave bags hotel 1100pm train left hotel value venice hesitate recommend looking comfortable slightly tighter budget

Reviews.Title: “Perfect small hotel for me...”
Reviews.Author: JohnDCM
Reviews.Content: recently stayed nights hotel academic arts greece found lodging clean neat friendly affordable city expensive lodging food location convenient venice beaten track quiet night breakfast standard continental special nonetheless adequate traveler budget stock day skip lunch coffee woman duty pleasant demeanor front desk helpful questions patient lack italian willing extra mile recommend hotel solo elderly elevator families

Reviews.Title: “Well located, excellent room, nice breakfast”
Reviews.Author: giemeigi
Reviews.Content: hotel walking distance train station located quiet crowd clean beautiful bathroom realy clean towels service staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Nice accomodations at value pricing in Venice”

Reviews.Content: venice expensive city stayed visit italy arrived air left train stay venice opposed mestre hotel tivoli fit bill nicely breakfast location dorsoduro easy park luggage city return check city return nap etc clean relatively quiet stay

Reviews.Title: “great location”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights location 10 15 minutes walk trainstation st marks square hotel clean shower bit minor staff nice stay time venice restaurants near hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the price”

Reviews.Content: location walk beds uncomfortable ok nights 4 twins sized somewhat noisey night expected alley venice bathrooms nice clean breakfast minimal venture restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, affordable”
Reviews.Author: Bellamisio
Reviews.Content: short stay breakfast including bread meat cheese fruit yogurt juice coffee cleaned day faced onto street windows bit noisy closing windows quiet im light sleeper double bed consisted single beds gotten hotels weve stayed italy pillows comfortable extra pillows blankets own temperature control included air conditioning bathroom suite spacious shower stall size service replaced towels daily decent location close st toma vaparetto stop venice walking distance hotel clean maintained oh free wifi speed

Reviews.Title: “Clean, convenient, inexpensive, but that's about it.”
Reviews.Author: Casbeth
Reviews.Content: hotel provided clean reasonably convenient lay heads short visit venice recommending bedrooms bathrooms clean beds comfortable unfortunately breakfast appetising pictures provided usual continental breakfast quality choice poor free internet connection useful preflight checkin airconditioning excellent especially visited height summer location minutes walk nearest vaporetto stop 1015 min walk piazzale roma main bus stop train station door bus station convenient summary hotel visit venice recommend hotel clean hotel reasonable price sleep sightseeing days hotel tivoli fine

Reviews.Title: “Okay no frill hotel”
Reviews.Author: christy1030
Reviews.Content: researched emailed probably 30 50 hotels value hotel island 58 euros included breakfast air conditioning shared bathroom experience expected clean wait sinks helpful pretty outdated ac wasnt super cold comforter cigarette burns walls smashed bugs coat paint help happy breakfast lot options computer internet didnt fix disappointing owner drop suitcase ready leave day left dont leave valuable sits unguarded lobby

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: cait011
Reviews.Content: hotel stay 3 days venice located pretty close st toma vaporetto stop fairly close sights visited including accademia peggy guggenheim rialto staff friendly stayed little price plus cost included air conditioning free wifi wifi lobby patio pretty convenient bathroom located hall sink mirror sharing bathroom deal wait breakfast morning pretty cereal milk yogurt breads ham cheese orange juice staff brought fresh coffee overall stay pretty location reasonably priced quiet cute lot character located dorsoduro sestiere wonder definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Super Clean, Great value, recommended”
Reviews.Author: dedicatedtraveller1
Reviews.Content: little hotel close heart venice super clean comfortable hotel expected neighbour noise quiet breakfast realized hotel actually breakfast sufficient variety tastes efficient friendly staff speaking english wonderful seeing dont speak italian free wifi fabulous seeing catch email communication hotel computer available guests overall hotel definite recommendation value
